title: Establishment
context: PART III. STATE HIGHWAY SYSTEM ยง264-41 Establishment. There is established a state highway system which shall consist of federal-aid highways and other public highways which may be designated for inclusion in the system pursuant to section 264-42. [L 1965, c 159, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง111-51; HRS ยง264-41] Case Notes A public highway is not a state highway unless it is designated for inclusion in the state highway system. 2 H. App. 387, 633 P.2d 1118.
